API¶

class Astra(namespace: str = 'camera')¶
read_rgb()¶
Returns

the cv2 BGR image from the Astra Camera

Return type

np.ndarray

read_depth()¶
Returns

a np array of depth from Astra Camera

Return type

np.ndarray

get_real_xyz(x, y, depth_img)¶

calculates and returns the real xyz coordinates of point (x, y) in depth image

Staticmethod

Parameters

  • x (int) – the x coordinate of the point

  • y (int) – the y coordinate of the point

  • depth_img (np.ndarray) – a depth image, which the return refers to

Returns

a tuple containing (x, y, z)

Return type

Tuple[int, int, int]
